# Wall and Anchor Blocks Installation - Cap aux Meules – Magdalen Islands Region

### Tender Information
#### Reference Number
* `cb-454-56206802`

#### Solicitation Number
* `30005015`

#### Amendment Number
* `5`

#### Publication Date
* `2023-10-24`

#### Tender Closing Date
* `2023-11-08T14:00:00`

#### Tender Status
The tender has expired.

### Project Description
The government is seeking proposals for a marine construction project in Cap aux Meules, Magdalen Islands Region. The project includes the installation of a prefabricated concrete wall, prefabricated concrete anchor wall, and construction of a new block for a gangway. The scope of work also includes removal and disposal of part of the pavement, excavation, stockpiling, and reuse of excavation materials, disposal of surplus material, and supply and installation of pavement.

### Project Timeline
The contractor must complete all work by June 30, 2024.

### Conditions and Special Requirements
* A Conditional Set-Aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) applies to this project.
* If two or more bids are received from Indigenous businesses certified under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) and listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory, the project will be conditionally set-aside under PSIB.
* Applicants using a boat for project work will be required to provide proof of maritime liability insurance.

### Tender Instructions
* This is an open tender.
* Interested parties must submit information and plans according to the specifications and requirements outlined in the tender documents.

### Contact Information
* Marie-France Chrétien 
	+ Phone: `(450) 521-4448`
	+ Email: `marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca`
* Address: `301 Bishop Dr, Fredericton, NB, E3C 2M6, Canada`
